Megatron/Wildfire:






Megatron stomped into the main section of the cave, his metallic 
claws clicking loudly against the rocky ground. He seemed to be the 
only one there. He got a slight feeling that Terrorsaur was close-by. 
He usually was. He spent most of his days in the main section of the 
cave or circling around the sky.

He looked around, needing to speak to anoter one of his troops, even 
if it had to be Terrorsaur, but he was out of sight. Just then, a 
frantic black horse came charging into the cave. She whinnied and 
screamed at him at the same time. It was Wildfire.

~He's here!~ she shouted, but without moving her mouth. ~Run you 
fool! Fight back!~

Megatron roared at her. Fighting and retreated into nothing, into 
darkness contended at him without him deciding for himself.
